cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.28.1)
project(monkey)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 23)
set(CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS ON)

include(FetchContent)
FetchContent_Declare(
        googletest
        GIT_REPOSITORY https://github.com/google/googletest.git
        GIT_TAG release-1.10.0
)

FetchContent_MakeAvailable(googletest)

# There are warnings generated by gtest and this line keeps them from being
# errors in this context while not setting them globally for the entire project
set_target_properties(gtest PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS
  "-Wno-error -Wno-maybe-uninitialized")

enable_testing()

add_subdirectory(src)
add_subdirectory(test)
